welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kokubunji, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic temples, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kokubunji has to offer during your stay here.

restaurants.name: Bakery Cafe Crown (ベーカリーカフェ クラウン 武蔵境店)
restaurants.description: Bakery Cafe Crown (ベーカリーカフェ クラウン 武蔵境店) is a bakery located in 武蔵野市.

restaurants.name: Kurumaya Ramen (くるまやラーメン 保谷新町店)
restaurants.description: Kurumaya Ramen (くるまやラーメン 保谷新町店) is a ramen restaurant located in 西東京市.
